languages.text: {n}Глаза существа закрыты, и грудь остается недвижима. Сложно сказать, мертво оно, спит или лишь выжидает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза существа закрыты, и грудь остается недвижима. Сложно сказать, мертво оно, спит или лишь выжидает.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. It is hard to say whether it is dead, asleep, or merely lying in wait.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза существа закрыты, и грудь остается недвижима. Сложно сказать, мертво оно, спит или лишь выжидает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. It is hard to say whether it is dead, asleep, or merely lying in wait.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}生き物の胸は微動だにせず、目はきつく閉じられている。死んでいるのか、眠っているのか、何かを待って横たわっているのかの判別がつかない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. It is hard to say whether it is dead, asleep, or merely lying in wait.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生き物の胸は微動だにせず、目はきつく閉じられている。死んでいるのか、眠っているのか、何かを待って横たわっているのかの判別がつかない。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}El pecho de la criatura permanece inmóvil y sus ojos están firmemente cerrados. No sabes si está muerta, dormida o al acecho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. It is hard to say whether it is dead, asleep, or merely lying in wait.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El pecho de la criatura permanece inmóvil y sus ojos están firmemente cerrados. No sabes si está muerta, dormida o al acecho.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}它双眼紧闭，胸膛早已失去起伏。你很难分辨它究竟是死了、睡着了，还是仅仅蛰伏在此处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. It is hard to say whether it is dead, asleep, or merely lying in wait.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}它双眼紧闭，胸膛早已失去起伏。你很难分辨它究竟是死了、睡着了，还是仅仅蛰伏在此处。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}La poitrine de la créature est immobile et ses yeux restent clos. Il est difficile de savoir si elle est morte, endormie ou à l'affût.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. It is hard to say whether it is dead, asleep, or merely lying in wait.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La poitrine de la créature est immobile et ses yeux restent clos. Il est difficile de savoir si elle est morte, endormie ou à l'affût.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Die Brust der Kreatur bleibt reglos, ihre Augen bleiben fest verschlossen. Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob sie tot ist, schläft, oder sich lediglich in Wartestellung befindet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. It is hard to say whether it is dead, asleep, or merely lying in wait.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Brust der Kreatur bleibt reglos, ihre Augen bleiben fest verschlossen. Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob sie tot ist, schläft, oder sich lediglich in Wartestellung befindet.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Yaratığın göğsü hareketsiz, gözleriyle sımsıkı kapalı. Ölü mü, uykuda mı yoksa sadece hazırda mı bekliyor olduğunu kestirmesi güç.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. It is hard to say whether it is dead, asleep, or merely lying in wait.{/n}
